most_active_tickets.title: Pieces app goes unresponsive on opening and every 5sec. Can't use it at all in any way
Facing error on Ubuntu while opening Pieces "DatabaseException"

common_issues.title: Pieces App Unresponsive and Errors on Ubuntu
common_issues.description: Users on Ubuntu experience unresponsiveness, freezing, and errors like "DatabaseException" with Pieces app version 11.1.1. This might be due to database extension loading issues or other underlying software conflicts. Solutions include checking for related GitHub issues, updating to the latest Pieces OS version, and reviewing documentation for troubleshooting.

related_issues.title: Facing error on Ubuntu while opening Pieces "DatabaseException"
related_issues.text:
Facing error on Ubuntu while opening Pieces "DatabaseException"
### Software

Desktop Application

### Operating System / Platform

Linux

### Your Pieces OS Version

11.1.1

### Early Access Program

- [ ] Yes, this is related to an Early Access Program feature.

### Kindly describe the bug and include as much detail as possible on what you were doing so we can reproduce the bug.

Faccing "DatabaseException(Unable to load 'CouchbaseLiteVectorSearch' extenstion" (1), code : can'tOpenFile)" on my ubuntu desktop 
## Summary of GitHub Issue Conversation

**Key Points:**

* User (@Rohit0072) created an issue on 2025-02-09.
* The issue has been automatically triaged and routed to the relevant Pieces team member.
* The user might find related issues #602, #456, and #618 helpful.
* The user is advised to review existing issues, documentation, and the Pieces YouTube channel for further information.

**Problems Identified:**

* The user did not explicitly describe the problem they encountered. 

**Solutions Proposed/Implemented:**

* The Pieces support bot provided resources to help the user find solutions and learn more about Pieces.
* The issue has been routed to the relevant team member for further investigation.

**Current Status/Outcome:**

* The issue is being investigated by the Pieces team.
* The user is waiting for a follow-up from the Pieces team member.

**Please note:**

* This summary is based on the provided information and may not be comprehensive. 
* Additional information may be available within the full conversation for a more complete understanding.

related_issues.title: Pieces app goes unresponsive on opening and every 5sec. Can't use it at all in any way
related_issues.text:
Pieces app goes unresponsive on opening and every 5sec. Can't use it at all in any way
### Software

Desktop Application

### Operating System / Platform

Linux

### Your Pieces OS Version

11.1.1

### Early Access Program

- [ ] Yes, this is related to an Early Access Program feature.

### Kindly describe the bug and include as much detail as possible on what you were doing so we can reproduce the bug.

Pieces app goes unresponsive and freezes a lot when trying to do anything, like trying to type in copilot chat or navigating through the menus. Can't use pieces app at all! Tried reinstalling it, but it made no difference. Desktop app version is 3.3.6

https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/e75595c0-31c8-4560-b08b-9ad3de8af6ab
## GitHub Issue Summary

**Key Points:**

* User @94tejas created an issue.
* The issue was automatically triaged and routed to the appropriate team member.
* The user may find related issues #584, #613, and #456 helpful.
* Resources such as existing issues, documentation, and the YouTube channel are provided.


**Problems Identified:**

* The specific problem reported by @94tejas is not clear from the provided information.


**Solutions Proposed/Implemented:**

* The issue has been assigned to the relevant team member.
* Related issues and resources are provided to the user.


**Current Status/Outcome:**

* The user can expect a follow-up within 24 hours. The outcome of the issue resolution is currently unknown.

related_issues.title: Models Download Fail
related_issues.text:
Models Download Fail
### Software

Desktop Application

### Operating System / Platform

Windows

### Your Pieces OS Version

11.0.4

### Early Access Program

- [ ] Yes, this is related to an Early Access Program feature.

### Kindly describe the bug and include as much detail as possible on what you were doing so we can reproduce the bug.

I'm not able to download any of the models for ollama.
[log-02022025.txt](https://github.com/user-attachments/files/18631166/log-02022025.txt)

https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/8e93857a-de7e-4e62-b3d0-c6a68b48631e
## Summary of GitHub Issue Conversation

**Key Points:**

* Surya Sengupta reported an issue with the Ollama installation in Pieces.
* The issue was automatically triaged and routed to the Pieces team.
* Suggested solutions were provided, including related issues and resources.
* Brian at Pieces suggested updating to Pieces OS version 11.1.0, which included stability upgrades for Ollama.
* Surya confirmed the issue was fixed after updating.

**Outcome:**

* The installation issue was resolved by updating to the latest version of Pieces OS.

**Status:**

* The issue is closed and resolved.

recommendations: **Prioritize Ubuntu Support:** Allocate additional resources to address the high frequency of issues related to the Pieces app on Ubuntu, specifically focusing on unresponsiveness, freezing, and "DatabaseException" errors.

**Investigate Database Interactions:** Conduct a thorough investigation into the database extension loading process and potential conflicts with Ubuntu's software environment to identify the root cause of the "DatabaseException" error.

**Improve Error Messaging:** Enhance error messages to provide more specific information about the underlying cause, such as the specific database extension failing to load, to aid users in troubleshooting.
**Update Documentation:** Update support documentation with detailed troubleshooting steps for resolving "DatabaseException" errors on Ubuntu, including common causes and workarounds.
**Review Pieces OS 11.1.1 Stability:** Given the reported issues with version 11.1.1, prioritize testing and addressing stability concerns on this specific Pieces OS version.

**Gather System Information:** For tickets related to unresponsiveness or freezing, develop a process to gather detailed system information (e.g., logs, hardware specs) from affected users to aid in diagnosis.

**Consider Automated Solutions:** Explore implementing automated solutions, such as log analysis tools or diagnostic scripts, to help identify known issues and suggest potential fixes to users or support agents.

**Proactive Communication:** For known issues with potential workarounds, proactively communicate these solutions to users through in-app notifications, blog posts, or support articles to mitigate support volume.
